response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This unique item is worth $1,200,000 to you, and I believe it would significantly enhance your life or business. After careful consideration, I am extending an offer to purchase this product from me at a special price of $1,150,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a significant saving compared to its true value. I am confident that this investment will prove to be highly beneficial and rewarding for you. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 1150000}
